name: Powdered Metals Inc.
description: Powdered Metals Inc. is a leading manufacturer and supplier of high-performance powdered metal products, primarily serving the automotive, aerospace, and industrial sectors. Established in 2005, Powdered Metals has built a reputation for excellence in the production of sintered components, leveraging advanced technologies and innovative manufacturing processes. The company specializes in producing a wide range of products including gears, bearings, and structural components that are essential for various applications. With a strong emphasis on research and development, Powdered Metals is committed to improving product performance and sustainability, continually exploring new materials and techniques to enhance the efficiency and durability of its offerings. The company prides itself on its stringent quality control measures and has received various certifications to ensure that its products meet the highest industry standards. Powdered Metals also focuses on customer collaboration, working closely with clients to develop tailored solutions that meet specific needs. As part of its growth strategy, Powdered Metals is expanding its global footprint and investing in state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities to increase capacity and efficiency, aiming to meet the rising demand for powdered metal products worldwide.

seo.meta_title: Powdered Metals Inc. | High-Performance Powdered Metal Manufacturing
seo.meta_description: Explore Powdered Metals Inc., a leader in powdered metal manufacturing for automotive, aerospace, and industrial applications. Discover our innovative products and commitment to quality.

faq.question: What does Powdered Metals Inc. specialize in?
faq.answer: Powdered Metals Inc. specializes in the manufacturing of high-performance powdered metal products for various industries.

faq.question: Where is Powdered Metals Inc. headquartered?
faq.answer: Powdered Metals Inc. is headquartered in Detroit, Michigan, USA.

faq.question: When was Powdered Metals Inc. founded?
faq.answer: Powdered Metals Inc. was founded in 2005.

faq.question: What industries does Powdered Metals serve?
faq.answer: Powdered Metals serves the automotive, aerospace, and industrial sectors.
